name: Eleven (itch) (Stone Castle Lab)
description:
This is my first 3D game made with CopperCube Game Engine in 10-12 hours. I hope you will like.

The inspiration for this game is an anecdote. A funny joke is told in my country:

A man was passing by the garden wall of the mental hospital.

voices were coming from the garden.

- 11, 11 , 11.....

The man was intrigued. Why do these crazy people say 11?

He climbed the wall and looked inside.

The madmen caught the man and killed him in the garden.

then they all said

-12, 12, 12....
